page.title: 08POPULATION
page.content: In 1981 the {population of Bitterne {Southampton }was {13 313}.Since then the figure has decreased slightly.This might be because of the major changes caused by the Bitterne development and because of the {drop in birthrate}. Caroline Andrews' group found that the average number of people in a household was 4.8.They also found there was a wide range of occupations. They made a study of where some of the present residents were born and found that {only one in six was born in {Bitterne}.Many more people have moved into Bitterne over the last forty years,changing its character from that of a village to that of a suburb of Southampton.
